general.title: General Settings
general.content: Configure basic system parameters including file upload limits, caching, and performance optimization settings that affect the entire application.
quickTips: Set appropriate file size limits based on your storage capacity
Enable compression to reduce bandwidth usage
Adjust cache duration based on how frequently your data changes

security.title: Security & Roles
security.content: Manage authentication settings, password policies, and access control rules. These settings are critical for protecting sensitive legal data and ensuring compliance.
quickTips: Enable two-factor authentication for admin accounts
Set session timeout based on security requirements
Use IP whitelisting for sensitive environments

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.content: Configure email, SMS, and push notification preferences. Set up notification triggers for case updates, task assignments, and deadline reminders.
quickTips: Test email configuration before going live
Set up notification templates for consistent messaging
Configure notification frequency to avoid overwhelming users

legal.title: Legal Configuration
legal.content: Configure case management parameters including case number formats, financial year settings, and workflow rules specific to legal practice.
quickTips: Use consistent case number formats across your organization
Set financial year based on your jurisdiction
Configure deadlines according to statutory requirements

ai-communications.title: AI & Communications
ai-communications.content: Configure AI assistant settings and communication templates. Enable AI-powered features for document analysis, case research, and automated responses.
quickTips: Review AI suggestions before sending to clients
Customize communication templates for your firm's tone
Set up default response templates for common queries

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.content: Connect external services like Google Calendar and Microsoft Outlook. Sync hearings and deadlines with your preferred calendar application.
quickTips: Use OAuth for secure calendar connections
Test sync functionality before enabling for all users
Configure sync frequency based on your needs

address.title: Address & Location
address.content: Configure address formats, state/city databases, and location settings used throughout the application for client addresses and court locations.
quickTips: Keep state and city lists updated
Use standardized address formats for consistency
Configure GST jurisdiction mappings

templates.title: Templates & Outcomes
templates.content: Manage document templates and outcome configurations. Define standard outcomes for hearings and cases to ensure consistent reporting.
quickTips: Create templates for common document types
Define outcome categories for better reporting
Use consistent naming conventions

legal-hierarchy.title: Legal Hierarchy
legal-hierarchy.content: Define the hierarchical structure of legal authorities and their sub-categories (matter types). This configuration affects case categorization and legal workflow across the entire application.
quickTips: Follow the standard legal hierarchy: Assessment → Adjudication → Tribunal → High Court → Supreme Court
Add matter types for authorities that have sub-categories (e.g., Tribunal has State Bench, Principal Bench)
Deactivating a level hides it from forms but preserves existing data

sample-data.title: Sample Data
sample-data.content: Generate sample data for testing and demonstration purposes. Use this feature in development or training environments only.
quickTips: Never use sample data in production
Clear sample data before going live
Use realistic data for effective testing
